intro.speaker: Ship AI
intro.text: Navigation protocols loaded. Mission objective: secure 4 waypoint beacons to establish a safe corridor.

beacon-1-lock.speaker: Beacon System
beacon-1-lock.text:
Beacon 1 locked. Triangulation grid stabilizing.

[Security protocols are active. Choose how to proceed.]

beacon-1-friendly.speaker: Beacon AI
beacon-1-friendly.text:
Access granted. Uploading tactical data to missile guidance.

**Reward: Missile Speed Boost I unlocked**

beacon-1-hostile.speaker: Beacon System
beacon-1-hostile.text: WARNING: Unauthorized override detected. Deploying countermeasures.

beacon-2-lock.speaker: Beacon System
beacon-2-lock.text:
Beacon 2 lock achieved. Signal fidelity increasing.

[Humanitarian safeties detected. Choose how to interact.]

beacon-2-friendly.speaker: Beacon Medical Core
beacon-2-friendly.text:
Aid channel accepted. Rerouting coolant reserves to missile bays.

**Reward: Missile Heat Capacity Boost I unlocked**

beacon-2-hostile.speaker: Beacon System
beacon-2-hostile.text: ALERT: Firewall breach detected. Deploying mixed hazard drones.

beacon-3-lock.speaker: Beacon System
beacon-3-lock.text:
Beacon 3 lock complete. Final defense grid online.

[Drone command channels available. Choose your approach.]

beacon-3-friendly.speaker: Beacon Command Node
beacon-3-friendly.text:
Alliance acknowledged. Amplifying thrust harmonics.

**Reward: Ship Speed Boost I unlocked**

beacon-3-hostile.speaker: Beacon System
beacon-3-hostile.text: EMERGENCY OVERRIDE DECLINED. Seeker strike wing mobilized.

mission-complete.speaker: Ship AI
mission-complete.text: All beacons secured. Navigation corridor established. Mission successful.

mission-failed.speaker: Ship AI
mission-failed.text: Mission failure detected. Reinitialising systems. You may retry from the last checkpoint.
